episodes.title: Slow Japanese【Podcast for Intermediates】Japanese Cults 😱
episodes.description:
🔴 Join the Waiting List for my Japanese program: ⁠https://mailchi.mp/mochifika/join-the-2026-japanese-program-waitlist
✅ Become a Member & Get Transcripts: https://bit.ly/SlowJapanese_Transcripts
🎁 How to use Slow Japanese:⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ https://bit.ly/44nWuaw

📚 Get my Book (Short Stories): https://mochifika.com/product/japanese-short-stories-for-beginners/

Welcome to Slow Japanese!
Slow Japanese is a podcast for beginner - intermediate Japanese learners.
As the program name shows, in this podcast, "Mochifika" project founder Akari talks about various topics in slow Japanese.
Listen to this slow & easy Japanese, and grow your ears into "Japanese ears". Start speaking Japanese today!
Transcripts for each episode can be viewed & downloaded on Patreon.

💙 Patreon
Welcome to Mochifika's community!
You can become a patron and access episodes' full transcripts, flashcards, LIVE streamings, and more✨
It’s also very helpful for content production and website management.
https://www.patreon.com/mochifika/membership/

👉  Mochifika: https://mochifika.com
Start to speak from Day 1 with Akari!
Mochifika is my one-man project for Japanese language learners and language lovers.
Feel free to book lessons or contact me!

All links to Akari & Mochifika:
👉  https://linktr.ee/mochifika

It's a great language, and by learning to speak Japanese you give yourself the opportunity to meet some really incredible people, and better immerse yourself in a fascinating culture. It can also open up a lot of doors and career opportunities, as there is plenty of demand for bilinguals.



👉Related Keywords: 【Slow Japanese - podcast for beginners & intermediates】Episode #133 - Japanese Cults 😱
